channel.title: Until It's Not Fun
channel.description: Recent content on Until It's Not Fun

item.title: Special Edition: Test Run
item.description: Popcorn and A Coke Where Jacob talks movies The first movie review was intimidating. Preface This adventure Westley and I have set out on is purely for enjoyment. So then, why is reviewing a movie intimidating? Not because of the difficulty, but rather, because of the respect I have for this field of “Film Making.” Resistance will forever be my antagonist, so here’s to another battle. I will probably stick to two types of “reviews.
